long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The first AI-powered AdBlocker designed to recognize and block popups, ads, trackers, and automatically skip YouTube ads.

Extension features :
üì∫ Auto-skip YouTube video ads
üî• Eliminate annoying popups
üßπ Hide or remove bad ads
ü§ñ Block most social and privacy trackers
‚ö° Pages load faster without Ads

Please Note: While AdGuard X is designed to block a significant number of ads, it may not intercept every ad or tracker. The web is constantly evolving, and some ads may still slip through. We're committed to making continuous improvements to enhance your browsing experience.

Our privacy policy is available here :
https://adguardx.com/privacy

It's a long read, so we will make it easy :
- We do not log any personal information with this extension.
- The only thing we log is how many ads we help you block and its anonymous.
